meanings.definition: The position or role of a collector.
meanings.sent1: In the museum, the collectorship of rare coins was highly respected.
meanings.sent2: Her collectorship of stamps from around the world was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The collectorship of seashells turned into a friendly competition among siblings.
meanings.sent4: His collectorship of memories was like a treasure trove of experiences.
meanings.sent5: The collectorship of antique books was a window into the past.

meanings.definition: The act of collecting or gathering items.
meanings.sent1: The collectorship of donations for the charity event was successful.
meanings.sent2: His collectorship of baseball cards started at a young age.
meanings.sent3: The collectorship of buttons became a quirky hobby for her.
meanings.sent4: Her collectorship of recipes was like a cookbook full of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The collectorship of rare gems was a passion that brought joy.
